overview: Carrie Watts is living the twilight of her life trapped in an apartment in 1940s Houston, Texas with a controlling daughter-in-law and a hen-pecked son. Her fondest wish – just once before she dies – is to revisit Bountiful, the small Texas town of her youth which she still refers to as "home."
cast: Geraldine Page|John Heard|Carlin Glynn|Richard Bradford|Rebecca De Mornay
